high_descs: Turn left to face the white table.
Pick up the newspaper off of the white table.
Turn left and walk around the coffee table to the small white table to the right of the couch.
Turn on the light of the small lamp that is on the small table in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Examine a newspaper in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the white cabinet below the television.
Pick the paper up from the white cabinet.
Go left and then left again to face the white table next to the couch.
Turn the lamp on the table on.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a newspaper and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Move right facing the newspaper on the white table top
Pick up the newspaper on top of the white table top
Carry the newspaper to the small white end table to the right of the sofa
Turn on the lamp on top of the end table
anns.task_desc: Carry a newspaper while turning on a lamp
